results.name: The order b_{4n-1} of the cyclic group S_{4n-1}^{bp} of oriented diffeomorphism classes of smooth homotopy (4n-1)-spheres that bound parallelizable manifolds, for n > 1.
comment: For a(n), Milnor 2011 Theorem 5 gives the formula
See A001676 for additional comments, references, and links.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..235
John W. Milnor, Differential Topology Forty-six Years Later, Notices Amer. Math. Soc. 58 (2011), 804-809 (see Theorem 5 and Table 3).
John W. Milnor, Spheres, Abel Prize lecture (video), 2011.
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_, Jun 15 2011
